description:
Unohana Retsu is in charge of the fourth protection squad. As the weakest of the thirteen divisions, Unohana`s team is in charge of medical care for the other shinigami. She has the temperament of a traditional Japanese woman and is gentle, soft-spoken and polite, though she is rumoured to have a fearsome side should you cross or annoy her. Her zanpakutou is named http://anidb.net/ch10919 [Minazuki].
Source: Anime-Planet
name: Unohana Retsu
